title: 3dANOVA3
description: Performs three-factor ANOVA on 3D data sets.

outfile_fa.title: Output File A
outfile_fa.description: Output file for the main ANOVA result.

outfile_fb.title: Output File B
outfile_fb.description: Output file for the main B ANOVA result.

outfile_fc.title: Output File C
outfile_fc.description: Output file for the main C ANOVA result.

outfile_fab.title: Output File AB
outfile_fab.description: Output file for the interaction between A and B.

outfile_fac.title: Output File AC
outfile_fac.description: Output file for the interaction between A and C.

outfile_fbc.title: Output File BC
outfile_fbc.description: Output file for the interaction between B and C.

outfile_fabc.title: Output File ABC
outfile_fabc.description: Output file for the interaction between A, B, and C.

outfile_amean.title: Output File A Mean
outfile_amean.description: Output file for the A mean results.

outfile_bmean.title: Output File B Mean
outfile_bmean.description: Output file for the B mean results.
